p: Methods: Single center observational retrospective study. A database was available for all patients. Based on the AKI Network definition patients were divided into 2 groups, group I without AKI (259 patients) and group II with AKI (100 patients) where serial of hsTnT and creatine kinase (CK)-MB followed. Both groups compared and statistically analyzed. We enrolled 359 patients, patients with ESRD were excluded.
